EmailTemplate.description: Template for notifying sender in Connect Team Email-to-Case that a new case has been made. DO NOT change unique name.
EmailTemplate.name: Connect Team Notification of New Case
EmailTemplate.subject: Support is on it's way
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting us!
You're request has been logged as case number {!Case.CaseNumber}. Have no fear! We will be in contact with you shortly.
Have a great day!
-Delta Dental of Minnesota Connect Team
